content:
ColorMode Enum

Definition

Specifies two modes for color component values.

In this Article

public enum ColorMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ColorMode

Remarks

For computers with 32-bit integers, use Argb32Mode. For computers with 64-bit integers, use Argb64Mode.

Fields

Argb32Mode

The integer values supplied are 32-bit values.
Argb64Mode

The integer values supplied are 64-bit values.
